name: Ten-thirty-lunch-crew
tagline: Repository for playing around on game creation
body:
### Welcome to the Ten Thirty Lunch Crew. This is a place for us to collaborate and learn more about making games for various platforms using a variety of tools. To start with, I'd like to collaborate on a game made with the Unity game engine. We can start with this and create more projects as we get new ideas. ### Who Can Contribute? To start with, this repository can be edited by collaborators only. Send me a message to be added to the list of collaborators. ### Authors and Contributors Brian Rhodes (@drummernash)
Andrew Upshaw (@aupshaw)
Kevin Jennings
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
